channel.title: Linux on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on TLDRBins

item.title: Cron Jobs
item.description: Linux Check Cron Jobs ls -la /etc/cron.d/ cat /etc/crontab crontab -l Check Background Processes ./pspy64 Ref: pspy64

item.title: Find
item.description: Linux Locate a file locate <FILE> Find files of type file find . -type f Find and Open find / -name <FILE> -exec cat {} \; Find SUID bit set files find / -type f -user root \( -perm -4000 -o -perm -2000 \) 2>/dev/null -ls Find files owned by user find / -user <USER> -ls 2>/dev/null | grep -v -e " \/proc" -e " \/sys" Find files owned by group find / -group <GROUP> 2>/dev/null | grep -v -e ^/proc Find files created between 1/1/2024 and 31/12/2024 find / -type f -newermt 2024-01-01 !

item.title: Firewall (Linux)
item.description: Linux Check Firewall Rules # Show all rules sudo iptables -L -v -n --line-numbers # Show target chain sudo iptables -L <CHAIN> -v -n --line-numbers sudo iptables -L INPUT -v -n --line-numbers Set Firewall Rules # Default Policy sudo iptables -P <CHAIN> <RULE> sudo iptables -P INPUT DROP sudo iptables -A <CHAIN> -p <PROTOCOL> -s <SOURCE> --dport <PORT> -j <RULE> # Allow SSH from a specific subnet sudo iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -s 192.
